user_query: I'm in the mood for some humor. Can you fetch the joke of the day from the Dad Jokes_v2 API? Additionally, I'd like to search for jokes with the keyword 'hilarious'. Please return up to three records.

TaskList.description: Fetch the joke of the day from the Dad Jokes_v2 API.
Search for jokes with the keyword 'hilarious' from the Dad Jokes_v2 API, limiting results to three records.
